Articles.Content: I would like to have an adult section in the forum ! Beer and Ksp are a good mix !! we need to talk about it !

I don't see why we can't have a "Favorite beer to KSP with" or even just "Favorite beer" in the off-topic forum. Is there a specific rule against discussing adult beverages?

I hope not, because I've lately been enjoying a nice vodka martini at launch time.

Afraid not, guys. From the forum rules:

2.2 Forbidden content... Adult content, such as nudity, sexually suggestive or explicit images, gore and drugs...

And liquor is a drug.
